featuresDescription: Don't waste time searching for the perfect listing description, we've got you covered
featuresProductTitle: Black Vans T-Shirt - Men's Size M - Excellent Condition
featuresProductDescription:
Hello! I'm selling my black Vans t-shirt, size M. I bought it a while ago, but I've only worn it a couple of times and now it doesn't fit me as I would like. It's really in excellent condition, like new!

Product Details:
- Brand: Vans
- Color: Black
- Size: M
- Condition: Used but kept very well

This t-shirt is made of 100% cotton, so it's super comfortable and perfect for summer, but also great to wear under a sweatshirt or jacket in colder months. It has the Vans logo on the chest, not too big, just that extra touch that never hurts.

I've always washed it carefully and kept it folded in the closet, so it has no tears, stains, or signs of wear. I'm honestly sorry to sell it because it's a really nice t-shirt, but I'd rather someone wear it than leave it unused.

Let me know if you're interested or if you have any other questions!
